body:
**What happened**:

We tried to separate logger functionality as subpackage of e2e test framework,
but we've recognized that should be core functionality and we should keep it as
core of e2e test framework after facing circular dependency issues.
After merging https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81426 the existing callers of subbackage e2elog need to switch
to use log functions of core e2e framework instead.
This issue is for tracking this working items.

**Necessary callers to be updated**:
- [x] test/e2e/framework/create.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/exec_util.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/flake_reporting_util.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/framework.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/get-kubemark-resource-usage.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/google_compute.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/log_size_monitoring.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/networking_utils.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/nodes_util.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81693)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/resource_usage_gatherer.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81685)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/rc_util.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81685)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/size.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81685)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/suites.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81685)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/test_context.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81685)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/util.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81685)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/pv_util.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81809)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/pods.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81809)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/deployment/*.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81811)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/endpoints/ports.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81811)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/ingress/ingress_utils.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81811)

- [x] test/e2e/framework/lifecycle/upgrade.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81814)
- [ ] test/e2e/framework/metrics/*.go (@oomichi Need to solve circular dependencies https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/82108 but need more work)
- [ ] test/e2e/framework/node/*.go (@oomichi Need to solve circular dependencies)
- [x] test/e2e/framework/perf/perf.go (@oomichi https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/81849)

/kind cleanup
/sig testing

labels.description: Issues or PRs related to refactoring the kubernetes e2e test framework
labels.name: area/e2e-test-framework

labels.description: Denotes an issue that needs help from a contributor. Must meet "help wanted" guidelines.
labels.name: help wanted

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to cleaning up code, process, or technical debt.
labels.name: kind/cleanup

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Testing.
labels.name: sig/testing

title: Use log functions of core e2e framework instead of e2elog sub package
